biotools.summary: Suite of tools to help simulate sets of sequence reads. While the original target was to simulate 454 reads, the different tools can be used quite flexibly to simulate other kinds of sequence data sets.

bioschemas.name: FlowSim
bioschemas.summary: Suite of tools to help simulate sets of sequence reads. While the original target was to simulate 454 reads, the different tools can be used quite flexibly to simulate other kinds of sequence data sets.
